incident_updates.body: Start time : 06/09/2022 22:00 UTC End time : 06/09/2022 23:00 UTC Service impact : Some latency will be observed during the maintenance Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we will be upgrading a network equipment

Start time : 07/09/2022 04:00 UTC End time : 07/09/2022 06:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be carrying out a maintenance on the cooling system of the rack L115B19.
Start time : 13/09/2022 06:30 UTC End time : 13/09/2022 12:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, some generator set will be checked.

Start time : 14/09/2022 02:00 UTC End time : 14/09/2022 03:00 UTC Service impact : Public network will be unavailable during the maintenance Service improvement : In order to maintain continuous improvement of our internal network infrastructure, we will be replacing a network equipment

Start time : 14/09/2022 04:00 UTC End time : 14/09/2022 05:00 UTC Service impact : Interruption of network redundancy and decreased bandwidth for servers with LACP enabled during the maintenance. Service improvement : In order to maintain continuous improvement of our internal network infrastructure, we will be replacing a network equipment
The maintenance has been postponed. Here is the new schedule : Start time : 14/09/2022 05:00 UTC End time : 14/09/2022 07:00 UTC

Start time : 06/09/2022 05:00 UTC End time : 06/09/2022 07:00 UTC Service impact : Servers in rack W14B10 will be unreachable during the maintenance Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we will doing a maintenance on our cooling system
